name: Whizz
overview: Ready to tackle the wittiest, mind-bendiest, action-filled adventure of them all? Then get ready to meet Whizz, the hip-hoppiest dude ever introduced! Wrap your brain around challenging puzzles and an enemy packed obstacle course as you guide Whizz back to his beautiful hot air balloon. Use your dizzying spin attack to eliminate enemies as you dash through level after level filled with bridges, buttons, catapults, rockets, and even bunny-eating shark infested waters! Whizz's unique 3D isometric view and eye-popping graphics are sure to make it an instant classic.
